name: Scrub Surfer
description:
Early Prototype work in progress

Many planned features are not yet prototyped.

Scrub Surfer is a 3D arcade endless runner set in a dirty kitchen sink. You play as a cleaning mascot who cleans the sink in style by surfing on a sponge and busting germs.

You control the game using a mouse input to dodge and weave between obstacles, scrub dirt and shoot germs.

The goal of the game is getting a high score, you achieve this through how long you survive, scrubbing dirt, and shooting germs.
